description: a(0) = 0; for n>0, a(n) = a(n-1) + n if n not prime else a(n-1) - n.
comments: Sequence is not monotonic.a(n) = a(n-1) + n * (1 - 2*A010051(n)) = a(n-1) + n * (2*A005171(n) - 1) = a(n-1) + n * (A005171(n) - A010051(n)). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 25 2009
links: William A. Tedeschi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: Difference between sum of composite numbers and prime numbers <= n. - _Zak Seidov_, Sep 27 2003
prog: (Haskell)a051352 n = a051352_list !! na051352_list = 0 : zipWith (+)   (a051352_list) (zipWith (*) [1..] $ map ((1 -) . (* 2)) a010051_list)-- _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jan 02 2015
author: Armand Turpel armandt(AT)unforgettable.com
